<anya-forger>.name: anya-forger
<anya-forger>.info: <anya-forger> is a small girl with short pink hair, green eyes, and distinctive horn-like accessories. She wears a black and gold school uniform and has an expressive, curious face.

<bond-forger>.name: bond-forger
<bond-forger>.info: <bond-forger> is a large white dog with fluffy fur and a gentle demeanor. He has precognitive abilities and often helps the Forger family in their missions.

<loid-forger>.name: loid-forger
<loid-forger>.info: <loid-forger> is a tall man with blonde hair and blue eyes. Known as 'Twilight', he is a master spy who assumes the identity of Loid Forger, a loving father and psychiatrist.

<yor-forger>.name: yor-forger
<yor-forger>.info: <yor-forger> is a devoted and protective mother figure to Anya, always striving to keep her safe despite her secret life as an assassin. Though awkward at times, her love for Anya is sincere and unwavering.

<Clara>.name: Clara
<Clara>.info: <Clara> is my girlfriend. She really loves me.
